mapper.insert: INSERT INTO song_list (name, image_url, about, user, create_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{imageUrl}, #{about}, #{user}, #{createTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT sl.*, u.username, COUNT(lm.music_id) AS musicCount FROM song_list sl LEFT JOIN user u ON sl.user = u.id LEFT JOIN list_music lm ON sl.id = lm.list_id
AND sl.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
GROUP BY sl.id, u.username ORDER BY sl.id ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM list_music WHERE list_id = #{listId} AND music_id = #{musicId}
mapper.select: SELECT music_id FROM list_music WHERE list_id = #{listId}
